attributes.action: No To Wetherspoons opening in Bexhill
attributes.additional_details: Bexhill is in risk of losing it`s heritage as Wetherspoons has brought Bexhill last remaing Cinema built in 1922 a group was within 24hrs of buying it when they were blocked by the owners and sold it to wetherspoons and 3 other shops next to the cinema in Western Rd, So this could be a Big pub in town when we already have 13 pubs around Bexhill and lot`s of independent Cafe`s and restaurants, Wetherspoons could close down afew of these and Job losses too.
